actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a $500 nonrefundable credit to individuals for the payment of real estate taxes.
short_title: Working Middle Class Tax Relief Act of 1998

summary.text: Working Middle Class Tax Relief Act of 1998 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a nonrefundable tax credit to individuals for the real estate taxes paid or accrued on their principal residence, up to a maximum applicable dollar amount ranging from $100 for taxable years beginning in 1999 to $500 in taxable years beginning in 2003 and thereafter.

titles.title: Working Middle Class Tax Relief Act of 1998
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a $500 nonrefundable credit to individuals for the payment of real estate taxes.
